# Kanban Board with Failed Tasks

## TASKS

- [x] **[TASK-001]** Completed task
  - Description: This one succeeded
  - Priority: HIGH
  - Dependencies: none

- [*] **[TASK-002]** Failed task
  - Description: This task failed during execution
  - Priority: MEDIUM
  - Dependencies: none

- [ ] **[TASK-003]** Pending task
  - Description: Not yet started
  - Priority: LOW
  - Dependencies: none
